瓝瓝瓝

瓝字的基本解释

瓝
bó
小瓜。
古书上说的一种草。

瓝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bó］
［《廣韻》蒲角切，入覺，並。］
亦作“瓟1”。
(1)小瓜。
(2)草名。

瓝字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【瓜字部】　瓝； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页746第02
【廣韻】蒲角切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】弼角切，?音雹。小瓜。【爾雅·釋草】瓞瓝，其紹瓞。【註】俗呼瓝瓜爲瓞，紹者瓜蔓緒。亦著子，但小如瓝。　又草名。【爾雅·釋草】瓝九葉。【疏】此草九葉叢生一莖。　又【集韻】匹角切，音璞。義同。

瓝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
瓝字的起名意思

暂无。

瓝
Basic explanation of words
瓝
bó
Melon.
A kind of grass said in ancient books.
瓝
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bó］
["Guangyun" Pujiao cuts, enters the senses, and merges. ]
Also known as "瓟1".
(1) Little melon.
(2) Cursive name.
瓝
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Guard Word Department] 　瓝; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 746 02
[Guang Yun] Pu Jiao cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] But the corner cut, sound hail. Melon. 【Erya·Shucao】Liao Su, its Shao Su. [Note] The vulgar call the gourd is the gourd, and the shaoer has the melon thread. It is also a child, but as small as a worm.　Also cursive name. 【Erya·Shucao】Nine leaves. 【Sparse】This grass has nine leaves and one stem.　[Jiyun] The angle of the horse is cut, and the sound is pure. The same meaning.
瓝

瓝
Name meaning
Nothing.
bó
